main event: On October 28, 1966, multiple observers reported seeing a bright white object in Atlanta, Georgia.
interesting points: The object was described as looking like it was on fire with smoke trailing off of it., Observers noted the object descended rapidly, leading one to suggest it might have been a glider., Witnesses felt the object was too fast to be anything familiar and believed it to be a UFO., The object's appearance resembled a spinning round light or a meteorball., All observers agreed that they could not determine the object's exact direction.
sighted object: a bright white object resembling a spinning light
witness description: Observers noted the object descended rapidly and looked as if it were on fire.
